ENG: Sets the object name to extract (filters input files)
[STRING] Sets the DPRTYPE to extract (filters input files)
[STRING] Sets the LOCO file used to get the coefficients (CALIBDB=LOC_{fiber})
[STRING] Sets the Order Profile file used to get the coefficients (CALIBDB=ORDER_PROFILE_{fiber}
[STRING] Sets the SHAPE DXMAP file used to get the dx correction map (CALIBDB=SHAPEX)
[STRING] Sets the SHAPE DYMAP file used to get the dy correction map (CALIBDB=SHAPEY)
[STRING] Sets the SHAPE local file used to get the local transforms (CALIBDB = SHAPEL)
[STRING] Sets the FP Master file to use (CALIBDB = FPMASTER)
[STRING] Sets the Thermal correction file to use (CAILBDB = THERMAL_{fiber})
[STRING] Sets the Background map file to use (CALIBDB = BKGRDMAP)
Telluric recipe to take hot stars and calculation their atmospheric transmission (to add to pca database)
obj_mk_tellu_spirou.py [NIGHT_NAME] [OBJ_DARK E2DSFF AB] \n obj_mk_tellu_spirou.py [NIGHT_NAME] [OBJ_FP E2DSFF AB]
Currently  allowed types: E2DS, E2DSFF
Telluric recipe to correct science spectra using transmission maps and pca fit.
obj_fit_tellu_spirou.py [NIGHT_NAME] [OBJ_DARK E2DSFF AB] \n obj_fit_tellu_spirou.py [NIGHT_NAME] [OBJ_FP E2DSFF AB]
Currently  allowed types: E2DS, E2DSFF

Telluric recipe to create template spectra (median of many observations) of the same object. Used to provide a better SED of stars in obj_mk_tellu and obj_fit_tellu. Note only needs to be run once for each science / hot star target.
obj_mk_template_spirou.py [OBJNAME] \n obj_mk_template_spirou.py Gl699
[STRING] The object name to process
[STRING] optional, the filetype (KW_OUTPUT) to use when processing files
[STRING] optional, the fiber type to use when processing files
